verses.2: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Nupi khat gai-in ta pasal a neih leh ni sagih sung tua nu a nin hi dinga, a nin neih huna mah bangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
verses.3: A ni giat ni-in a naungek vun dawn ki-at ding hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin nupi in ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawm thum le ni thum sung om lai ding hi. Amah in kisiansuahna ni a cin mateng a siangtho na khat peuhpeuh lawng loin, biakbuk sungah zong tum lo ding hi.
verses.5: “Ahih hangin amah in ta numei a neih leh, ama nin neih huna mah bangin nipikal nih sung a nin hi ding hi. Ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawm guk le ni guk sung om lai ding hi.
verses.6: “Amah a kisiansuahna hun a cin ciangin tapa ading hitaleh tanu ading hitaleh, amah in kikhopna buk kong a siampipa kiangah meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno khat le khialhna hanga biak nadingin kawl vakhu no khat ahi a, vakhu khat ahi zongin pia dinga,
verses.7: siampipa in Topaʼ mai ah pia-in, ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi. Tua ciangin ama si luanna panin tua nu a siang hi ding hi. Hih pen ta pasal hitaleh ta numei hitaleh a nei nu adingin ngeina ahi hi.
verses.8: “Tua nu in tuuno a piak zawh kei leh vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhu no nih ahi zongin paipih dinga, khat pen meihal biak nading, a dang khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading ahi hi. Siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, tua nu a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
